name: Gerry Rosenthal
description: '''Gerry Rosenthal''' is an American musician, singer-songwriter and actor. He has starred in films and short films and has guest starred in television series such as ''[[Law & Order franchise|Law & Order]]'' and ''[[Celebrity Deathmatch]]''. He is best known for providing the voice for Jimmy Hopkins, the main playable character in the 2006 video game ''[[Bully (video game)|Bully]]'', for which he was nominated for a [[Spike Video Game Awards#2006 Awards|2006 Spike VGA Award for Best Performance by a Human Male]] and a [[10th Annual Interactive Achievement Awards|10th Annual Interactive Achievement Award for]] [[D.I.C.E. Award for Outstanding Achievement in Character|Outstanding Achievement in Character Performance - Male]].
